Sentencas: The feature of operating at high temperature enables solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) generating power at impressive efficiency while providing useful heat.
Titulo: Proposal and assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell cogeneration system in order to produce high-temperature steam aiming at industrial applications

Sentencas: Commercial SOFC cogeneration products for domestic hot water supply are already available, however, the potential of supplying high-temperature heat (especially in the form of steam) for industrial applications has not been well exploited yet.
Titulo: Proposal and assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell cogeneration system in order to produce high-temperature steam aiming at industrial applications

Sentencas: Here, a new SOFC cogeneration system layout is proposed and studied to address the problem.
Titulo: Proposal and assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell cogeneration system in order to produce high-temperature steam aiming at industrial applications

Sentencas: The core idea is to utilize the residual heat in parallel by the method of splitting the high-temperature streams, rather than in cascade as in traditional layouts.
Titulo: Proposal and assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell cogeneration system in order to produce high-temperature steam aiming at industrial applications

Sentencas: Therefore, the application of SOFC cogeneration can be expanded from providing low-temperature heat to high-temperature heat, from homes to industries.
Titulo: Proposal and assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell cogeneration system in order to produce high-temperature steam aiming at industrial applications

Sentencas: The simulation result shows that the layout with anode gas recycle (AGR) has the best performance in both net and cogeneration efficiency.
Titulo: Proposal and assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell cogeneration system in order to produce high-temperature steam aiming at industrial applications

Sentencas: The best predicted net efficiency is 56.9% and cogeneration efficiency 86.8% for the AGR layout.
Titulo: Proposal and assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell cogeneration system in order to produce high-temperature steam aiming at industrial applications

Sentencas: For the AGR layout with a net capacity of 10 MW, the steam production ability of medium, low and super low pressures are 5903 kg/h, 6436 kg/h and 6748 kg/h, respectively.
Titulo: Proposal and assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell cogeneration system in order to produce high-temperature steam aiming at industrial applications

Sentencas: The investigated gas split locations only have negligible effect on the steam production ability.
Titulo: Proposal and assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell cogeneration system in order to produce high-temperature steam aiming at industrial applications
